strings.string: ARA_Change your digital satellite receiver settings
ARA_Setup your digital satellite receiver including antenna, channel search, update, etc
ARA_Display the programme information of each channel in time and date order
ARA_Edit TV/radio channel list and sort them in the numerical or alphabetic order
ARA_Manage and view your multimedia content in one place
ARA_Display device information including system versions, free disk space, etc

ARA_Access your picture collection and view them as a slideshow with transition effects

ARA_When set to 'On', LNBs will be switched between low and high band
ARA_When set to 'On', DiSEqC repeats its command
ARA_Set one of the pre-defined transponder frequency and symbol rate to get the best signal strength and quality in order to confirm that your settings are correct
ARA_If you set to 'On', both the existing transponders and additional transponders that have not yet been stored to be located are scanned for new channels
ARA_When set to 'Off', only the factory default transponders of the satellites you previously selected will be scanned for new channels.

ARA_Press OK button to start a channel search

ARA_No channels available for the selected mode
ARA_When set to 'Separated', the tuner 2 receives its own signal input
ARA_however it will receive only the channel level currently being received by the tuner 1 when this is set to 'Loopthrough'
ARA_When set to 'Same with Tuner 1', both tuners are connected to the same signal source
ARA_Select a control method for tuner 1
ARA_You can add, delete or configure satellites here
